text: Arsenic tribromide, also known as arsenic(III) bromide, is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is AsBr3. It has arsenic and bromide ions in it. The arsenic is in its +3 oxidation state. ==Properties== Arsenic tribromide is a white or pale yellow solid. It is highly toxic. It reacts with water to make arsenic trioxide and hydrobromic acid. It melts at a low temperature. ==Preparation== It is made by reacting arsenic and bromine. ==Related pages== *Arsenic trichloride *Antimony tribromide *Bismuth tribromide Category:Arsenic compounds Category:Bromine compounds
title: Arsenic tribromide
